data.tweet: Liverpool dominated possession, completing 561 passes to Manchester Utd's 194.
sentences: Liverpool completed an impressive tally of 561 passes.
Manchester Utd completed 194 passes.

data.tweet: Liverpool completed an impressive 42 passes into the final third, while Manchester Utd managed 16.
sentences: Liverpool managed to play an impressive 42 successful balls into the final third.
Manchester Utd successfully played 16 balls into the final third.

data.tweet: Liverpool successfully played 93 long balls (69% completion), while Manchester Utd managed 26 (36%).
sentences: Liverpool completed 93 long balls.
Manchester Utd completed 26 long balls.
Liverpool completed 69% of the passes they played long.
Manchester United completed 36% of the passes they played long.

data.tweet: Liverpool saw more of the ball, taking 788 touches to Manchester Utd's 432.
sentences: Liverpool took 788 touches of the ball.
Manchester Utd took 432 touches.

data.tweet: Mohamed Salah played three key passes -  more than any other player on the pitch.
sentences: Mohamed Salah played three passes that lead to a teammate's shot.
Mohamed Salah had the highest passing accuracy of any player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Mohamed Salah carried the ball into the opponent's box three times, more than any other Liverpool player.
sentences: Mohamed Salah carried the ball into the opponent's box three times.
Mohamed Salah carried the ball farther towards the opponent's goal than any other Liverpool player.

data.tweet: Joe Gomez successfuly completed 86 passes - more than any other player on the pitch.
sentences: Joe Gomez completed an impressive tally of 86 passes.
Joe Gomez completed more passes than any other player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Joe Gomez recorded the game's highest numbers for progressive passing (a combined 625 yards towards the opponents goal) and successful long balls (18).
sentences: Joe Gomez passed the ball a total of 625 yards towards the opponents goal.
Joe Gomez passed the ball farther towards the opponents goal than any other player on the pitch.
Joe Gomez completed 18 long balls.
Joe Gomez completed more long balls than any other player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Joe Gomez carried the ball a total of 236 yards towards the opponent's goal - farther than any other player on the pitch.
sentences: Joe Gomez managed to carry the ball an impressive 236 yards towards the opponent's goal.
Joe Gomez carried the ball farther towards the opponent's goal than any other player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Mohamed Salah made the most successful dribbles - four.
sentences: Mohamed Salah dribbled past an opponent four times.
Mohamed Salah dribbled past an opponent more times than any other player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Joe Gomez made the most interceptions - three.
sentences: Joe Gomez made three interceptions.
Joe Gomez had the highest passing accuracy of any player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Joe Gomez won five aerial duels - more than any other player on the pitch.
sentences: Joe Gomez won five aerial duels.
Joe Gomez won more aerial duels than any other player on the pitch.
